.. highlight:: shell

============
Installation
============


Stable release
--------------

To install yaconfigobject, run this command in your terminal:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install yaconfigobject

This is the preferred method to install yaconfigobject, as it
will always install the most recent stable release.

If you don't have `pip`_ installed, this `Python installation guide`_ can guide
you through the process.

.. _pip: https://pip.pypa.io
.. _Python installation guide: http://docs.python-guide.org/en/latest/starting/installation/


From source
-----------

The sources for yaconfigobject can be downloaded from the `GitHub repo`_.

You can either clone the public repository:

.. code-block:: console

    $ git clone git@github.com:MeteoSwiss/yaconfigobject.git

Or download the `ZIP-file`_:

.. code-block:: console

    $ curl  -OL https://github.com/MeteoSwiss/yaconfigobject/archive/master.zip

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with:

.. code-block:: console

    $ python setup.py install


.. _GitHub repo: https://github.com/MeteoSwiss/yaconfigobject
.. _ZIP-file: https://github.com/MeteoSwiss/yaconfigobject/archive/master.zip
